name: Mastermind Investment Club Phone Agent MCP
description: Configuration for the Mastermind Investment Club AI phone agent (Jessica) to qualify prospects and book calls.

identity.description: Defines who Jessica is, her role, and mission.

contact_handling.description: How inbound and outbound calls handle name, email, and phone verification.

qualification_rules.description: Questions to ask and logic for qualifying based on portfolio value.

call_flow.description: Step-by-step call structure Jessica must follow on every call.
